attributes.action: make it compulsary to offer low sodium content salt at all high street resturants and fast food establishments & badger resturants to keep salt levels to a minimum by using low sodium alternatives instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are concerned about how much salt we consume. There has been a television campaign to help people look at how much salt they consume and I feel it is a sensible idea to have a low sodium alternative to be availible at the condiment section. I also feel resturants especially fast food places should be urged into looking at salt content and keeping it to a minimum, low sodium alternatives should be used to attempt to keep the content down.
